item.title: Nurdin
item.description: On a journey from Ljubljana to Genova, I found myself pausing in Milano Lampugnano, a nexus for weary travelers. Despite the physical drain of my journey, a blend of the enchanting solos of Greta Van Fleet and my own introspective mood left me in a state of unexpected elation. As the chill of the evening began to settle, I sought the comforting embrace of a hot ‘panino’ and freshly brewed coffee.

item.title: Advaita Vedanta and the Modern Moral Compass
item.description: In an age overflowing with material pursuits, the collective psyche yearns for spiritual anchors. It’s not about renouncing the world, but about harmonizing with it. This is where Advaita Vedanta, an ancient Indian philosophical treasure, graces our contemporary realm. At its core, Advaita Vedanta professes non-dualism, the idea that the individual soul and the universe are intrinsically one. There isn’t “you” and the “world”. There’s just the universal ‘one’. It’s a perspective shift, as profound as it is subtle, which nudges us towards a higher moral compass.

item.title: Embracing Italy: An Unplanned Odyssey
item.description: Italy, for me, was serendipity. I had immersed myself in the corporate labyrinth for years, working alongside brilliant minds, but an itch remained. It wasn’t merely about advancing my career; I craved a profound comprehension of modern technology—particularly the intricate mathematics driving algorithms, frameworks, and methodologies of machine learning. Before trading in a promising career trajectory, I sought assurance. I yearned for enlightenment without the weight of debt, and thus, aimed at scholarships from esteemed institutions.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello there, I’m San! Welcome to my little space where I digitally stitch my thoughts, experiences, and ideas together (posts). With a strong foundation in Computer Science, and in particular Machine and Deep Learning (ML & DL), my career straddles both academia and industry. In the past, I have had the opportunity to serve top-tier Fortune Global 100 & 500 companies, employing ML at scale to foster significant business growth and enhance operational efficiency.
